verses.verse: הללויה <WH1984> Praise הודו <WH3034> O give thanks ליהוה <WH3068> unto the LORD; כי <WH3588> for טוב <WH2896> good: כי <WH3588> for לעולם <WH5769> forever. חסדו׃ <WH2617> his mercy
מי <WH4310> Who ימלל <WH4448> can utter גבורות <WH1369> the mighty acts יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD? ישׁמיע <WH8085> can show forth כל <WH3605> all תהלתו׃ <WH8416> his praise?
אשׁרי <WH835> Blessed שׁמרי <WH8104> they that keep משׁפט <WH4941> judgment, עשׂה <WH6213> he that doeth צדקה <WH6666> righteousness בכל <WH3605> at all עת׃ <WH6256> times.
זכרני <WH2142> Remember יהוה <WH3068> me, O LORD, ברצון <WH7522> with the favor עמך <WH5971> thy people: פקדני <WH6485> O visit בישׁועתך׃ <WH3444> me with thy salvation;

לראות <WH7200> That I may see בטובת <WH2896> the good בחיריך <WH972> of thy chosen, לשׂמח <WH8055> that I may rejoice בשׂמחת <WH8057> in the gladness גויך <WH1471> of thy nation, להתהלל <WH1984> that I may glory עם <WH5973> with נחלתך׃ <WH5159> thine inheritance.
חטאנו <WH2398> We have sinned עם <WH5973> with אבותינו <WH1> our fathers, העוינו <WH5753> we have committed iniquity, הרשׁענו׃ <WH7561> we have done wickedly.

אבותינו <WH1> Our fathers במצרים <WH4714> in Egypt; לא <WH3808> not השׂכילו <WH7919> understood נפלאותיך <WH6381> thy wonders לא <WH3808> not זכרו <WH2142> they remembered את <WH853> רב <WH7230> the multitude חסדיך <WH2617> of thy mercies; וימרו <WH4784> but provoked על <WH5921> at ים <WH3220> the sea, בים <WH3220> sea. סוף׃ <WH5488> at the Red
ויושׁיעם <WH3467> Nevertheless he saved למען <WH4616> שׁמוהודיע <WH3045> to be known. את <WH853> גבורתו׃ <WH1369> that he might make his mighty power

ויגער <WH1605> He rebuked בים <WH3220> sea סוף <WH5488> the Red ויחרב <WH2717> also, and it was dried up: ויוליכם <WH1980> so he led בתהמות <WH8415> them through the depths, כמדבר׃ <WH4057> as through the wilderness.
ויושׁיעם <WH3467> And he saved מיד <WH3027> them from the hand שׂונא <WH8130> of him that hated ויגאלם <WH1350> and redeemed מיד <WH3027> them from the hand אויב׃ <WH341> of the enemy.
ויכסו <WH3680> covered מים <WH4325> And the waters צריהם <WH6862> their enemies: אחד <WH259> one מהם <WH1992> לא <WH3808> there was not נותר׃ <WH3498> them left.
ויאמינו <WH539> Then believed בדבריו <WH1697> they his words; ישׁירו <WH7891> they sang תהלתו׃ <WH8416> his praise.
מהרו <WH4116> They soon שׁכחו <WH7911> forgot מעשׂיו <WH4639> his works; לא <WH3808> not חכו <WH2442> they waited לעצתו׃ <WH6098> for his counsel:
ויתאוו <WH183> תאוהמדבר <WH4057> in the wilderness, וינסו <WH5254> and tempted אל <WH410> God בישׁימון׃ <WH3452> in the desert.
ויתן <WH5414> And he gave להם <WH1992> שׁאלתם <WH7596> them their request; וישׁלח <WH7971> but sent רזון <WH7332> leanness בנפשׁם׃ <WH5315> into their soul.
ויקנאו <WH7065> They envied למשׁה <WH4872> Moses במחנה <WH4264> also in the camp, לאהרן <WH175> Aaron קדושׁ <WH6918> the saint יהוה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD.
תפתח <WH6605> opened ארץ <WH776> The earth ותבלע <WH1104> and swallowed up דתן <WH1885> Dathan, ותכס <WH3680> and covered על <WH5921> and covered עדת <WH5712> the company אבירם׃ <WH48> of Abiram.
ותבער <WH1197> was kindled אשׁ <WH784> And a fire בעדתם <WH5712> in their company; להבה <WH3852> the flame תלהט <WH3857> burned up רשׁעים׃ <WH7563> the wicked.
יעשׂו <WH6213> They made עגל <WH5695> a calf בחרב <WH2722> in Horeb, וישׁתחוו <WH7812> and worshiped למסכה׃ <WH4541> the molten image.
וימירו <WH4171> Thus they changed את <WH853> כבודם <WH3519> their glory בתבנית <WH8403> into the similitude שׁור <WH7794> of an ox אכל <WH398> that eateth עשׂב׃ <WH6212> grass.
שׁכחו <WH7911> They forgot אל <WH410> God מושׁיעם <WH3467> their savior, עשׂה <WH6213> which had done גדלות <WH1419> great things במצרים׃ <WH4714> in Egypt;
נפלאות <WH6381> Wondrous works בארץ <WH776> in the land חם <WH2526> of Ham, נוראות <WH3372> terrible things על <WH5921> by ים <WH3220> sea. סוף׃ <WH5488> the Red

ויאמר <WH559> Therefore he said להשׁמידם <WH8045> that he would destroy לולי <WH3884> them, had not משׁה <WH4872> Moses בחירו <WH972> his chosen עמד <WH5975> stood בפרץ <WH6556> him in the breach, לפניו <WH6440> before להשׁיב <WH7725> to turn away חמתו <WH2534> his wrath, מהשׁחית׃ <WH7843> lest he should destroy
וימאסו <WH3988> Yea, they despised בארץ <WH776> land, חמדה <WH2532> the pleasant לא <WH3808> not האמינו <WH539> they believed לדברו׃ <WH1697> his word:
וירגנו <WH7279> But murmured באהליהם <WH168> in their tents, לא <WH3808> not שׁמעו <WH8085> hearkened בקול <WH6963> unto the voice יהוה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD.
וישׂא <WH5375> Therefore he lifted up ידו <WH3027> his hand להם <WH1992> להפיל <WH5307> against them, to overthrow אותם <WH853> במדבר׃ <WH4057> them in the wilderness:
ולהפיל <WH5307> To overthrow זרעם <WH2233> their seed בגוים <WH1471> also among the nations, ולזרותם <WH2219> and to scatter בארצות׃ <WH776> them in the lands.
ויצמדו <WH6775> They joined themselves לבעל פעור <WH1187> also unto Baalpeor, ויאכלו <WH398> and ate זבחי <WH2077> the sacrifices מתים׃ <WH4191> of the dead.
ויכעיסו <WH3707> Thus they provoked to anger במעלליהם <WH4611> with their inventions: ותפרץ <WH6555> broke in בם מגפה׃ <WH4046> and the plague
ויעמד <WH5975> Then stood up פינחס <WH6372> Phinehas, ויפלל <WH6419> and executed judgment: ותעצר <WH6113> was stayed. המגפה׃ <WH4046> and the plague

ותחשׁב <WH2803> And that was counted לו לצדקה <WH6666> unto him for righteousness לדר <WH1755> unto all generations ודר <WH1755> unto all generations עד <WH5704> forevermore. עולם׃ <WH5769> forevermore.
ויקציפו <WH7107> They angered על <WH5921> also at מי <WH4325> the waters מריבה <WH4808> of strife, וירע <WH3415> so that it went ill למשׁה <WH4872> with Moses בעבורם׃ <WH5668> for their sakes:
כי <WH3588> Because המרו <WH4784> they provoked את <WH853> רוחו <WH7307> his spirit, ויבטא <WH981> so that he spoke unadvisedly בשׂפתיו׃ <WH8193> with his lips.
לא <WH3808> They did not השׁמידו <WH8045> destroy את <WH853> העמים <WH5971> the nations, אשׁר <WH834> concerning whom אמר <WH559> commanded יהוה <WH3069> להם׃ <WH1992>
ויתערבו <WH6148> But were mingled בגוים <WH1471> among the heathen, וילמדו <WH3925> and learned מעשׂיהם׃ <WH4639> their works.
ויעבדו <WH5647> And they served את <WH853> עצביהם <WH6091> their idols: ויהיו <WH1961> which were להם <WH1992> למוקשׁ׃ <WH4170> a snare
ויזבחו <WH2076> Yea, they sacrificed את <WH853> בניהם <WH1121> their sons ואת <WH853> בנותיהם <WH1323> and their daughters לשׁדים׃ <WH7700> unto devils,

וישׁפכו <WH8210> And shed דם <WH1818> blood, נקי <WH5355> innocent דם <WH1818> the blood בניהם <WH1121> of their sons ובנותיהם <WH1323> and of their daughters, אשׁר <WH834> whom זבחו <WH2076> they sacrificed לעצבי <WH6091> unto the idols כנען <WH3667> of Canaan: ותחנף <WH2610> was polluted הארץ <WH776> and the land בדמים׃ <WH1818> with blood.
ויטמאו <WH2930> Thus were they defiled במעשׂיהם <WH4639> with their own works, ויזנו <WH2181> and went a whoring במעלליהם׃ <WH4611> with their own inventions.

ויחר <WH2734> kindled אף <WH639> Therefore was the wrath יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD בעמו <WH5971> against his people, ויתעב <WH8581> insomuch that he abhorred את <WH853> נחלתו׃ <WH5159> his own inheritance.
ויתנם <WH5414> And he gave ביד <WH3027> them into the hand גוים <WH1471> of the heathen; וימשׁלו <WH4910> them ruled בהם שׂנאיהם׃ <WH8130> and they that hated
וילחצום <WH3905> also oppressed אויביהם <WH341> Their enemies ויכנעו <WH3665> them, and they were brought into subjection תחת <WH8478> under ידם׃ <WH3027> their hand.

פעמים <WH6471> times רבות <WH7227> Many יצילם <WH5337> did he deliver והמה <WH1992> them; but they ימרו <WH4784> provoked בעצתם <WH6098> with their counsel, וימכו <WH4355> and were brought low בעונם׃ <WH5771> for their iniquity.
וירא <WH7200> Nevertheless he regarded בצר <WH6862> their affliction, להם <WH1992> בשׁמעו <WH8085> when he heard את <WH853> רנתם׃ <WH7440> their cry:
ויזכר <WH2142> And he remembered להם <WH1992> בריתו <WH1285> for them his covenant, וינחם <WH5162> and repented כרב <WH7230> according to the multitude חסדו׃ <WH2617> of his mercies.
ויתן <WH5414> He made אותם <WH853> לרחמים <WH7356> them also to be pitied לפני <WH6440> of כל <WH3605> all שׁוביהם׃ <WH7617> those that carried them captives.

הושׁיענו <WH3467> Save יהוה <WH3068> us, O LORD אלהינו <WH430> our God, וקבצנו <WH6908> and gather מן <WH4480> us from among הגוים <WH1471> the heathen, להדות <WH3034> to give thanks לשׁם <WH8034> name, קדשׁך <WH6944> unto thy holy להשׁתבח <WH7623> to triumph בתהלתך׃ <WH8416> in thy praise.

ברוך <WH1288> Blessed יהוה <WH3068> the LORD אלהי <WH430> God ישׂראל <WH3478> of Israel מן <WH4480> from העולם <WH5769> everlasting ועד <WH5704> to העולם <WH5769> everlasting: ואמר <WH559> say, כל <WH3605> and let all העם <WH5971> the people אמן <WH543> Amen. הללו <WH1984> Praise יה׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD.
